rpx
  • Reference
  • Articles

Return recent PX announcements

Queries the PX rss feed file for the latest PX dataset announcements.

pxannounced()

Value

A data.frame with announcements data set identifiers, publication dates and annoucement messages.

Examples

pxannounced()
#> 15 new ProteomeXchange annoucements
#>     Data.Set    Publication.Data             Message
#> 1  PXD004898 2016-12-22 19:23:16                 New
#> 2  PXD002925 2016-12-22 19:12:47                 New
#> 3  PXD004173 2016-12-22 17:03:21                 New
#> 4  PXD005184 2016-12-22 16:25:57                 New
#> 5  PXD000115 2016-12-22 15:50:21                 New
#> 6  PXD004236 2016-12-22 15:31:36                 New
#> 7  PXD001889 2016-12-22 13:48:49 Updated information
#> 8  PXD004069 2016-12-22 13:48:20                 New
#> 9  PXD004541 2016-12-22 13:34:14                 New
#> 10 PXD004626 2016-12-22 12:46:54                 New
#> 11 PXD004625 2016-12-22 12:38:40                 New
#> 12 PXD004624 2016-12-22 12:30:17                 New
#> 13 PXD005462 2016-12-22 12:22:00                 New
#> 14 PXD004966 2016-12-22 12:10:18                 New
#> 15 PXD004987 2016-12-22 11:57:32                 New
